sentences.sContent: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane and pine.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane and pine.
sentences.sCn: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的。

sentences.sContent: Can we have some salt / pepper / vinegar / mustard, please?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can we have some salt / pepper / vinegar / mustard, please?
sentences.sCn: 可以帮我加一些盐、胡椒粉、醋、芥末吗？

words.tran: 不愉快的；尖酸的；乖戾的；有醋味的

trans.tranOther: a sour-tasting liquid made from malt or wine that is used to improve the taste of food or to preserve it
